item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, December 7, 2024 at 5:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: App to discover job listings directly from company websites (46 points | 26 comments)
2. I algorithmically donated $5000 to Open Source (158 points | 35 comments)
3. Show HN: Countless.dev – A website to compare every AI model: LLMs, TTSs, STTs (137 points | 35 comments)
4. Every V4 UUID (1191 points | 330 comments)
5. Helsing at Eurorust and the Oxidation of Defense (15 points | 6 comments)
6. Hiroshi Nagai: Japan's Sun-Drenched Americana (114 points | 16 comments)
7. Next-level frosted glass with backdrop-filter (286 points | 50 comments)
8. FSharpPacker – compile F# scripts to executables (53 points | 6 comments)
9. Police illegally sell restricted weapons, supplying crime (43 points | 6 comments)
10. The Curse of Recursion: Training on generated data makes models forget (2023) (93 points | 62 comments)
11. MIT largest open-source car design dataset, incl aerodynamics, to speed design (5 points | discuss)
12. My second year without a job (351 points | 503 comments)
13. Biggest shell programs (159 points | 71 comments)
14. Can life emerge around a white dwarf? (64 points | 44 comments)
15. : The Dialog Element (283 points | 121 comments)
16. Accessing a DRM Framebuffer to display an image (38 points | 5 comments)
17. SpiderBasic (31 points | 21 comments)
18. Lies I was told about collab editing, Part 1: Algorithms for offline editing (233 points | 79 comments)
19. 21 Algol 60 Compilers in 1962 (34 points | 27 comments)
20. Mistakes as a new manager (238 points | 97 comments)
21. OpenAI Reinforcement Fine-Tuning Research Program (188 points | 45 comments)
22. Mathics 7.0 – Open-source alternative to Mathematica (52 points | 11 comments)
23. Nucleotide Transformer: building robust foundation models for human genomics (38 points | 5 comments)
24. The electric shock behind Europe's stuttering EV future (7 points | 1 comment)
25. Install postmarketOS on Android phone and use Docker as a home server (265 points | 102 comments)
26. Structured Outputs with Ollama (216 points | 57 comments)
27. DSPy – Programming–not prompting–LMs (158 points | 32 comments)
28. RNA-targeting CRISPR reveals that noncoding RNAs are not 'junk' (143 points | 74 comments)
29. MultiQueue-Based FPGA Routing: Relaxed A* Priority Ordering-Improved Parallelism [pdf] (29 points | 2 comments)
30. An invisible desktop application that will help you pass technical interviews (124 points | 133 comments)
